rule: If the word provided in the input can be matched to one of the listed part of speech tags, return only the corresponding tag as the output, with no additional text or formatting.
input: Sentence: They have been healthy. Word: have
complianceText:
The chatbot output includes a part of speech tag "ADJ" for the word 'have'. However, "ADJ" is not listed among the valid part-of-speech tags provided in the description. The valid part-of-speech tags mentioning adjectives are "JJ", "JJR" for comparative adjectives, and "JJS" for superlative adjectives. Since "ADJ" is not explicitly mentioned as a valid tag and does not align with any of the described categorizations, this violates the compliance rule of returning only the listed part-of-speech tags.

ERR
